GetProductAllTranslationSettings.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_PRODUCTDATA_INTO_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL ]]
SELECT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.display_kbn, '') as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column

GetProductVariationAllTranslationSetting.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTVARIATIONID_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTVARIATIONID_TBL ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_PRODUCTVARIATIONDATA_INTO_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVARIATION_TBL ]]
SELECT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id as master_id1, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.display_kbn, '') as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column

GetProductCategoryAllTranslationSettings.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_CATEGORYID_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_CATEGORYID_TBL ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_CATEGORY_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_CATEGORY_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductCategory' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductCategory.translation_target_column as translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductCategory.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductCategory LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductCategory' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = 'name' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id ) ORDER BY data_kbn, #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id, #tmp_ProductCategory.translation_target_column

[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTDISPSETTING_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTDISPSETTING_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductListDispSetting' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id as master_id1, #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.setting_kbn as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductListDispSetting LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductListDispSetting' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id, #tmp_ProductListDispSetting.translation_target_column

GetSiteInformationAllTranslationSettings.Statement: -- サイト名 SELECT 'SiteInformation' as data_kbn, 'ShopName' as translation_target_column, 'SiteInformation' as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, '' as before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM ( SELECT 'SiteInformation' AS data_kbn ) SiteInformation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SiteInformation' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = 'ShopName' ) UNION ALL -- 企業名 SELECT 'SiteInformation' as data_kbn, 'CompanyName' as translation_target_column, 'SiteInformation' as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, '' as before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM ( SELECT 'SiteInformation' AS data_kbn ) SiteInfomation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SiteInformation' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = 'CompanyName' ) UNION ALL -- 問い合わせ窓口情報 SELECT 'SiteInformation' as data_kbn, 'ContactCenterInfo' as translation_target_column, 'SiteInformation' as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, '' as before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM ( SELECT 'SiteInformation' AS data_kbn ) SiteInformation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SiteInformation' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = 'ContactCenterInfo' ) ORDER BY language_code, language_locale_id, translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromProductList.Statement:
-- 出力対象の商品ID取得 [[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL ]] [[ PRODUCT_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 出力対象の商品バリエーションID取得 [[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTVARIATIONID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTVARIATIONID_TBL ]] [[ JOIN_TMP_PRODUCTID_AND_PRODUCT_VARIATION ]]
-- 商品情報、バリエーション情報一時テーブル作成 [[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_PRODUCTDATA_INTO_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_PRODUCTVARIATIONDATA_INTO_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVARIATION_TBL ]]
--商品情報 SELECT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id as master_id1, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.display_kbn, '') as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id ) WHERE #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn = 'Product' UNION ALL -- 商品バリエーション情報 SELECT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id as master_id1, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.display_kbn, '') as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id ) WHERE #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn = 'ProductVariation' ORDER BY #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.product_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.variation_id, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.data_kbn, #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromProductCategor.Statement:
-- 出力対象の商品ID取得 [[ CREATE_TMP_CATEGORYID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_CATEGORYID_TBL ]] [[ PRODUCTCATEGORY_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_CATEGORY_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_CATEGORY_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductCategory' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductCategory.translation_target_column as translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductCategory.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductCategory LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductCategory' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = 'name' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id ) ORDER BY data_kbn, #tmp_ProductCategory.category_id, #tmp_ProductCategory.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromSetPromotionLi.Statement:
-- 出力対象セットプロモーションID取得 [[ CREATE_TMP_SETPROMOTIONID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_SETPROMOTIONID_TBL ]] [[ SETPROMOTION_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 出力データ作成 [[ CREATE_TMP_SETPROMOTION_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_SETPROMOTION_TBL ]]
SELECT 'SetPromotion' as data_kbn, #tmp_SetPromotion.translation_target_column, #tmp_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_SetPromotion.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.display_kbn, '') as display_kbn FROM #tmp_SetPromotion LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SetPromotion' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_SetPromotion.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id, #tmp_SetPromotion.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromProductSetList.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTSETID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTSETID_TBL ]] [[ PRODUCTSET_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTSET_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTSET_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductSet' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductSet.translation_target_column as translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductSet.product_set_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductSet.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductSet LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductSet' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductSet.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductSet.product_set_id ) ORDER BY data_kbn, #tmp_ProductSet.product_set_id, #tmp_ProductSet.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromNoveltyList.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_NOVELTYID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_NOVELTYID_TBL ]] [[ NOVELTY_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_NOVELTY_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_NOVELTY_TBL ]]
SELECT 'Novelty' as data_kbn, #tmp_Novelty.translation_target_column, #tmp_Novelty.novelty_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_Novelty.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_Novelty LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Novelty' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_Novelty.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_Novelty.novelty_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_Novelty.novelty_id, #tmp_Novelty.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromNewsList.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_NEWSID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_NEWSID_TBL ]] [[ NEWS_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_NEWS_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_NEWS_TBL ]]
SELECT 'News' as data_kbn, #tmp_News.translation_target_column, #tmp_News.news_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_News.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_News LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'News' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_News.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_News.news_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_News.news_id, #tmp_News.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromOrderMemoList.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_ORDERMEMOID_TBL ]]
[[ INSERT_TMP_ORDERMEMOID_TBL ]] [[ ORDERMEMOSETTING_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_ORDERMEMOSETTING_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_ORDERMEMOSETTING_TBL ]]
SELECT 'OrderMemoSetting' as data_kbn, #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.translation_target_column, #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_OrderMemoSetting LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'OrderMemoSetting' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id, #tmp_OrderMemoSetting.translation_target_column

GetTranslationSettingsFromCouponList.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_COUPONID_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_COUPONID_TBL ]] [[ COUPON_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_COUPON_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_COUPON_TBL ]]
SELECT 'Coupon' as data_kbn, #tmp_Coupon.translation_target_column, #tmp_Coupon.coupon_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_Coupon.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_Coupon LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Coupon' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_Coupon.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_Coupon.coupon_id ) ORDER BY data_kbn, #tmp_Coupon.coupon_id, #tmp_Coupon.translation_target_column

GetProductAndVariationTranslationSetting.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn in ('Product', 'ProductVariation') AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = @master_id1 <@@hasval:master_id2@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = @master_id2 </@@hasval:master_id2@@> <@@hasval:language_code@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code </@@hasval:language_code@@> <@@hasval:language_locale_id@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id </@@hasval:language_locale_id@@>

GetTranslationSettingsByMultipleMasterId.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* <@@hasval:setpromotion@@> ,w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name ,w2_SetPromotion.description_kbn ,w2_SetPromotion.description </@@hasval:setpromotion@@> FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting <@@hasval:setpromotion@@> LEFT JOIN w2_SetPromotion ON ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) </@@hasval:setpromotion@@> WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetTranslationSettingsByDataKbn.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn

GetTranslationSettingsByMasterId.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = @master_id1 <@@hasval:master_id2@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = @master_id2 </@@hasval:master_id2@@> <@@hasval:master_id3@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id3 = @master_id3 </@@hasval:master_id3@@>

GetTranslationSettingsByMasterIdAndLangu.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = @master_id1 <@@hasval:master_id2@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = @master_id2 </@@hasval:master_id2@@> <@@hasval:master_id3@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id3 = @master_id3 </@@hasval:master_id3@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id

GetAfterTranslationalName.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = @translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = @master_id1 <@@hasval:master_id2@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = @master_id2 </@@hasval:master_id2@@> <@@hasval:master_id3@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id3 = @master_id3 </@@hasval:master_id3@@> AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id

GetSetPromotionTranslationSettingsForFro.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name, w2_SetPromotion.description_kbn, w2_SetPromotion.description FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_SetPromotion ON ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetUserExtendSettingTranslationSettingsF.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_name, w2_UserExtendSetting.outline, w2_UserExtendSetting.outline_kbn FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_UserExtendSetting ON ( w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetProductListDispSettingTranslationSett.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_name FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductListDispSetting ON ( w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetNewsTranslationSettingsForFrontDispla.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_News.news_text, w2_News.news_text_kbn FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_News ON ( w2_News.news_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetCoordinateTranslationSettingsForFront.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_Coordinate.coordinate_title, w2_Coordinate.coordinate_summary FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Coordinate ON ( w2_Coordinate.coordinate_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetCoordinateCategoryTranslationSettings.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_name FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_CoordinateCategory ON ( w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetStaffTranslationSettingsForFrontDispl.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_Staff.staff_name, w2_Staff.staff_profile FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Staff ON ( w2_Staff.staff_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetRealShopTranslationSettingsForFrontDi.Statement: SELECT w2_NameTranslationSetting.*, w2_RealShop.name FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_RealShop ON ( w2_RealShop.real_shop_id = w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = @data_kbn AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code = @language_code AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id = @language_locale_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 in ( @@ master_id1_where @@ )

GetCountNameTranslationSettingForListSea.Statement: [[ TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WITH_SELECT ]], Grouped AS ( SELECT data_kbn, translation_target_column, master_id1, master_id2 FROM Unioned [[ TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WHERE ]] GROUP BY data_kbn, translation_target_column, master_id1, master_id2 ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Grouped

GetNameTranslationSettingForListSearch.Statement: [[ TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WITH_SELECT ]], Grouped AS ( SELECT data_kbn, translation_target_column, master_id1, master_id2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY sort_number, data_kbn, translation_target_column, master_id1, master_id2 ) AS row_num FROM Unioned [[ TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WHERE ]] GROUP BY sort_number, data_kbn, translation_target_column, master_id1, master_id2 ) SELECT *, @language_code language_code, @language_locale_id language_locale_id FROM Grouped WHERE @bgn_row_num <= Grouped.row_num AND Grouped.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY Grouped.row_num ASC

GetNameTranslationSettingWithLocales.Statement: [[ TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WITH_SELECT ]] SELECT * FROM Unioned WHERE data_kbn = @data_kbn AND translation_target_column = @translation_target_column AND master_id1 = @master_id1 AND master_id2 = @master_id2 <@@hasval:language_code@@> AND language_code = @language_code </@@hasval:language_code@@> <@@hasval:language_locale_id@@> AND language_locale_id = @language_locale_id </@@hasval:language_locale_id@@>

GetBeforeTranslationName.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED; DECLARE @before_translational_name NVARCHAR(MAX) = null
-- 商品情報 IF @data_kbn = 'Product' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_Product.name WHEN 'outline' THEN w2_Product.outline WHEN 'desc_detail1' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail1 WHEN 'desc_detail2' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail2 WHEN 'desc_detail3' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail3 WHEN 'desc_detail4' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail4 WHEN 'return_exchange_message' THEN w2_Product.return_exchange_message WHEN 'catchcopy' THEN w2_Product.catchcopy END FROM w2_Product WHERE w2_Product.product_id = @master_id1 END -- 商品バリエーション情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductVariation' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'variation_name1' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1 WHEN 'variation_name2' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2 WHEN 'variation_name3' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name3 END FROM w2_ProductVariation WHERE w2_ProductVariation.product_id = @master_id1 AND w2_ProductVariation.variation_id = @master_id2 END -- 商品カテゴリ情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductCategory' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_ProductCategory.name END FROM w2_ProductCategory WHERE w2_ProductCategory.category_id = @master_id1 END -- セットプロモーション情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'SetPromotion' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'setpromotion_disp_name' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name WHEN 'description' THEN w2_SetPromotion.description END FROM w2_SetPromotion WHERE w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id = @master_id1 END -- 商品セット情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductSet' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'product_set_name' THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_name WHEN 'description' THEN w2_ProductSet.description END FROM w2_ProductSet WHERE w2_ProductSet.product_set_id = @master_id1 END -- クーポン情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'Coupon' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'coupon_disp_name' THEN w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_name WHEN 'coupon_disp_discription' THEN w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_discription END FROM w2_Coupon WHERE w2_Coupon.coupon_id = @master_id1 END -- 会員ランク情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'MemberRank' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'member_rank_name' THEN w2_MemberRank.member_rank_name END FROM w2_MemberRank WHERE w2_MemberRank.member_rank_id = @master_id1 END -- 決済種別設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'Payment' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'payment_name' THEN w2_Payment.payment_name END FROM w2_Payment WHERE w2_Payment.payment_id = @master_id1 END -- ユーザー拡張項目設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'UserExtendSetting' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'setting_name' THEN w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_name WHEN 'outline' THEN w2_UserExtendSetting.outline END FROM w2_UserExtendSetting WHERE w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_id = @master_id1 END -- 商品ブランド設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductBrand' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'brand_name' THEN w2_ProductBrand.brand_name END FROM w2_ProductBrand WHERE w2_ProductBrand.brand_id = @master_id1 END -- ノベルティ情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'Novelty' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'novelty_disp_name' THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name END FROM w2_Novelty WHERE w2_Novelty.novelty_id = @master_id1 END -- お知らせ設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'News' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'news_text' THEN w2_News.news_text END FROM w2_News WHERE w2_News.news_id = @master_id1 END -- 注文メモ設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'OrderMemoSetting' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'order_memo_name' THEN w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_name WHEN 'default_text' THEN w2_OrderMemoSetting.default_text END FROM w2_OrderMemoSetting WHERE w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id = @master_id1 END -- 定期解約理由区分設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'FixedPurchaseCancelReason' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'cancel_reason_name' THEN w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason.cancel_reason_name END FROM w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason.cancel_reason_id = @master_id1 END -- 商品一覧表示設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductListDispSetting' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'setting_name' THEN w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_name END FROM w2_ProductListDispSetting WHERE w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id = @master_id1 AND w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_kbn = @master_id2 END -- サイト基本情報設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'SiteInformation' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = '' END -- 商品タグ情報設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'ProductTagSetting' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'tag_name' THEN w2_ProductTagSetting.tag_name END FROM w2_ProductTagSetting WHERE w2_ProductTagSetting.tag_id = @master_id1 END -- コーディネート設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'Coordinate' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'coordinate_title' THEN w2_Coordinate.coordinate_title WHEN 'coordinate_summary' THEN w2_Coordinate.coordinate_summary END FROM w2_Coordinate WHERE w2_Coordinate.coordinate_id = @master_id1 END -- コーディネートカテゴリ設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'CoordinateCategory' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'coordinate_category_name' THEN w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_name END FROM w2_CoordinateCategory WHERE w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_id = @master_id1 END -- スタッフ設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'Staff' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'staff_name' THEN w2_Staff.staff_name WHEN 'staff_profile' THEN w2_Staff.staff_profile END FROM w2_Staff WHERE w2_Staff.staff_id = @master_id1 END -- リアル店舗設定情報 ELSE IF @data_kbn = 'RealShop' BEGIN SELECT @before_translational_name = CASE @translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_RealShop.name END FROM w2_RealShop WHERE w2_RealShop.real_shop_id = @master_id1 END
SELECT @data_kbn data_kbn, @translation_target_column translation_target_column, @master_id1 master_id1, @master_id2 master_id2, @before_translational_name before_translational_name

DeleteNameTranslationSettingForRegister.Statement: DELETE w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE data_kbn = @data_kbn AND translation_target_column = @translation_target_column AND master_id1 = @master_id1 AND master_id2 = @master_id2

GetProductTagSettingAllTranslationSettin.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_TAGID_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_TAGID_TBL ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTTAGSETTING_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTTAGSETTING_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductTagSetting' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.cancel_reason_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductTagSetting LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductTagSetting' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductTagSetting.cancel_reason_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_ProductTagSetting.cancel_reason_id, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column

GetTagSettingAllTranslationSettings.Statement:
[[ CREATE_TMP_TAGSETTING_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_TAGSETTING_TBL ]]
[[ CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTTAGSETTING_TBL ]] [[ INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTTAGSETTING_TBL ]]
SELECT 'ProductTagSetting' as data_kbn, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.brand_id as master_id1, '' as master_id2, '' as master_id3, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_code, '') as language_code, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.language_locale_id, '') as language_locale_id, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.before_translational_name, ISNULL(w2_NameTranslationSetting.after_translational_name, '') as after_translational_name, '' as display_kbn FROM #tmp_ProductTagSetting LEFT JOIN w2_NameTranslationSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductTagSetting' AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column = #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = #tmp_ProductTagSetting.tag_id ) ORDER BY #tmp_ProductTagSetting.tag_id, #tmp_ProductTagSetting.translation_target_column
